channel.title: Zinc - Have any of you tried it?
channel.description:
Title. It's a tablet which helps with basically anything in your body. I'm going to start taking it because I suffer from not sleeping.. and it helps motivate apparently. It can help with anything apparently, Acne, hair, teeth, and for like $10 i have no reason not to try it.
if anyone has tried it, can u tell me if it worked? i dont think the younger people have tried it but maybe people 15+

item.title: Zinc - Have any of you tried it?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:21, topic:363656”]Zinc is horrible… You gotta cover up the taste with something strong, like cold milk ![/quote]I’m taking the tablets. Not a liquod one :L, tho did u try it? what did u use it for? and did it work?

Read full topic
item.source: Zinc - Have any of you tried it?
